properties.name: title
properties.description: Responsible for displaying the bold title in the center block of notification

properties.name: description
properties.description: Responsible for displaying plain description in the center block under the title of the notification

properties.name: additionalTitle
properties.description: Responsible for displaying the additional title in the right block of notification with color that will be passed color props

properties.name: additionalDescription
properties.description: Responsible for displaying plain description in the right block under the additional title of the notification

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Responsible for displaying an icon in the left block of the notification

properties.name: badge
properties.description: In case when equal true, turn on displaying badge on the right section of notification

properties.name: badgeIconPadding
properties.description: Responsible for badge icon padding. Remark - badge Icon have 5px margin right by default

properties.name: short
properties.description: Responsible for displaying short type of notification without right block
